scripts.postsetup_powershell: cd src; rename savi-lib lib; cd lib; (git remote add upstream https://github.com/ml5174/savi-lib.git || echo skipping, moving on); git checkout master; git pull upstream master; cd ../..; (git remote add upstream https://github.com/ml5174/sacpcp.git || echo skipping, moving on); git checkout master; git pull upstream master; npm install -g ionic cordova; npm install; ionic serve
scripts.postsetup: cd src && (rename savi-lib lib || mv savi-lib lib) && cd lib && (git remote add upstream https://github.com/ml5174/savi-lib.git || echo skipping, moving on) && git checkout master && git pull upstream master && cd ../.. && (git remote add upstream https://github.com/ml5174/sacpcp.git || echo skipping, moving on) && git checkout master && git pull upstream master && npm install -g ionic cordova && npm install && ionic serve
